channel.title: VPS Help
channel.description:
Hey guys. If anyone can help me with my problem, ill greatly appreciate it! okay...
I recently bought a VPS server hoster package and i wonder how can i run my server on it? Since you need
to execute a batch file to start a server, how can you do that on a hoster? Once i upload my server folder
to (lets say Tomcat5) my database, how can i execute the run.bat file?
Thanks

item.title: VPS Help
item.dc:creator: @ianternet ianternet
item.description:
@ianternet wrote:

if its vps is it linux or windows if windows use remote desktop to connect to it then run the bat file

Read full topic
